values.value: 811 (One Call) is required to be contacted, and the prescribed wait time completed, before digging activities commence. 811 will provide a ticket number to verify this process has been followed. If the crew is digging with-in 3ft of any underground utility markings they must confirm the exact location and depth of the utility by potholing. No machines may be used with-in 3ft of any marked utility. CFR 1926.651(b)(2)
Does the crew have an active ticket for utility location services?
